channel.title: [508]HOW DO I CHANGE PORT?[508] Helper gets ++
channel.description:
Ok, so I want to host a 508. I am hosting 2 other servers at the moment. I'm being nice and hosting someone's on port 1313. And I'm hosting my own 317 server on 43594. Now I want to host my own 508 and have the people download the Umair client IP changer. How do I make it so they can connect with an IP I make separate for it along with another port? If I change the port will they still be able to connect? Because I want to keep my 317 running for a while. Whoever helps me gets rep ++.
Brandon

item.title: [508]HOW DO I CHANGE PORT?[508] Helper gets ++
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

umm go to the 317, change its port, then just host the 508 on 43594, idk of any way to change the port to 508, maybe in server.java, never looked for it, never wanted to lok for it, if its wrong then your just SOL

Read full topic

Different ports 1313 on one server and 43594 from the same computer and I wanted to add a 508 (Rubiks scape:P Don’t worry I’ll cred you.) to the family.

Brandon
